data.name: Herobound: First Steps
data.description:
Herobound: First Steps is a third-person adventure game built specifically for virtual reality that places you inside a richly imagined fantasy world. 
 
Journey through underground ruins and ancient temples in search of treasure. As you play, youâ€™ll solve puzzles and battle a variety of monsters with classic hack-n-slash combat.
 
Herobound: First Steps uses VR to immerse you in detailed environments and to add new gameplay elements, like using head tracking to explore your surroundings. You can look around to find secrets, gems, treasure chests, and more.

Will you heed the call to adventure? Experience the magic of Herobound: First Steps!
